Title: Requires narcan, naloxone or other approved medication to be included in overdose rescue kits on college and university campuses
Summary: Requires narcan, naloxone or other approved medication to be included in overdose rescue kits on college and university campuses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring narcan, naloxone or other approved medication to be included in overdose rescue kits on college and university campuses
